entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
